alert.note: Alert for Carbon; Monroe (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 18 at 3:16AM EDT until April 19 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches expected. * WHERE...Carbon and Monroe. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 10 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There may be localized higher snow totals of 6 inches or more at the higher elevations above 1500 feet in Monroe county.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
